name: Shuffled Words
description:
Shuffled Words is a casual word guessing game!

We have these topics at the moment:

1980's Movies
1990's Movies
2000 Movies
1980's Songs
1990's Songs
Tv Series
Animes
Playstation 1 Games
Playstation 2 Games
Xbox Games
Super Nintendo Games

Each topic have at least 100 words for you to guess, they're presented randomly at each guess / skip.

You can play by guessing the word, using HINTS, shuffling as many times you like, ordering the word from A to Z, revealing a random word.
No clue of the current word? you can Skip the word for the next one or ~cheat~ by clicking to reveal the current word.

No loss here, just fun.
---

Why should I buy this game?

It's a relaxing game, you'll support my work, for this and future projects!
